When frequent in use, probe might feel warm. Max temperature of probe is set to 39.7 degrees celsius. If exceeding, a warning shall appear on screen and light on probe be red. If not, please contact your nearest service representative on ..

When frequent in use, probe might feel warm. Max temperature of probe is set to 39.7 degrees celsius. If exceeding, a warning shall appear on screen and light on probe be red. If not, please contact your nearest service representative on ..
A red light means the battery is getting critically low, or an error has occured.

Melody probe light indicates the state of the probe, whether it's in pairing mode (pulsating blue), connected to a display (steady blue), getting low on battery (yellow/red) or any unexpected error. Read more about light indications here: www.vscanmelody.com/lightindications
To start using Melody is easy. Let me help you!
Great! Have you also registered the app?
It sounds like you have the app installed and registered, meaning you shall be able to scan having a probe in hand.
If you still face any issues, please contact GE service at...
So first, you need to install the app.

For Android devices, you have to access the Google Play store.
Please search for "GE Vscan Melody" and download the app.
Did you manage to download?

If the app does not appear in the app store, make sure that your device and OS (operating system) meets the Vscan Melody system requirements, and that you are visiting the app store from a country in which Vscan Melody is available. Vscan Melody requirements can be found at www.vscanmelody.com/specs
Perfect! Now you can open the app and explore the Demo Mode, or if already purchased a probe, go to Register!
Very well! Please do not hesitate to contact me again if you have any further questions!

For Apple devices, you have to access the App Store.
Please search for "GE Vscan Melody" and download the app.

If you have both Android and iOS (Apple) devices, please enter the two app stores: Google Play (Android) and App Store (Apple).
Please search for "GE Vscan Melody" and download the app.

Vscan Melody is a robust, but yet light and high quality wireless probe, able to connect to most Android and iOS devices.  Melody comes with a protective case, usb cable and AC adapter. The app can be downloaded on Google Play or App Store.
Melody is compatible with most Android or Apple devices, both phones and tablets, following our recommended minumum specs. Please visit www.vscanmelody.com/specs, to find recommended minumum specs.

Hi,  I'm the Vscan Melody chatbot. Please ask any questions related to Vscan Melody!  
My expertise varies from product specs, to service, sales and troubleshooting. I also have human colleagues ready to help if needed.
Your Melody probe might have an issue with battery. If using the Vscan Melody AD-adapter and USB cable, and still not working, please contact your closest Vscan Melody service representative:
Your Melody probe might have an issue with battery. If using the Vscan Melody AD-adapter and USB cable, and still not working, please contact your closest Vscan Melody service representative:
Your Melody probe battery might be discharged. Try charging the probe with the AC-adapter for at least 10 minutes and power on the device.
Vscan Melody battery might not have sufficient charge. Try to charge the Vscan Melody for at least 60 minutes. If no effect, please contact your nearest service representative:
The Melody probe colors are white and light grey. White on linear side, and light grey on curved side.
Melody is available in USA.
Melody is available in Norway.
Melody is available in UK.
Melody is available in Japan.
Melody is available in Germany
Melody is available in France.
The Melody probe battery shall last for approximately 1 hour of continous scanning, with 80% b-mode and 20% color flow. The complete lifetime of Melody probe battery is 500 charge cycles.
